CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 7, 1955, pg. 15 reads: "Home, Sweet Home - The Negro family, which yesterday suffered because of economical, sociological and political obstacles in attempting to buy a decent home, is today demanding, purchasing and maintaining new homes similar to the one pictured above. And their children like 12-year-old Randall Warren and sister, Alice, of 102 Burdine Drive, Bixwood Acres, near Sewickley, enjoy doing odd jobs in keeping the home, sweet home. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: One story ranch style brick house with attached garage, and door with three horizontal rectangular windows, and two picture windows
